alert.note: Alert for Custer; Logan; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 7:44PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Logan, east central McPherson and northwestern Custer Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 744 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Stapleton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stapleton, Arnold, Gandy, Ringgold, Logan, Tarboz Lake, Shanklin Bluff, Hoagland and Brown Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 between mile markers 214 and 228. Highway 83 between mile markers 110 and 127. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for central and west central Nebraska.
